texts.textentryhtml:
Dan Fellows Platt, by 1924 [1]; 1937 gift to Princeton University Art Museum.

[1] lent to Princeton University Art Museum in 1924

bibliography.boilertext: Hayden B.J. Maginnis, The World of the early Sienese painter,  (University Park, PA: Pennsylvania State University, 2001).
